dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3773 IH: Unemployment Benefits Extension Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Jackson Lee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To extend the emergency unemployment compensation program until January 1, 2015.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Unemployment Benefits Extension Act of 2013 or the Unemployed Jobhunters Protection and Assistance Act of 2013.

section.header: Extension of emergency unemployment compensation program

subsection.text: Section 4007(a)(2) of the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 (Public Law 110–252; 26 U.S.C. 3304 note) is amended by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2015.
Section 4004(e)(1) of the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 (Public Law 110–252; 26 U.S.C. 3304 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (I), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (J), by inserting and at the end; and
by inserting after subparagraph (J) the following:

subparagraph.text: the amendment made by section 2(a) of the Unemployment Benefits Extension Act of 2013;

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect as if included in the enactment of the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 (Public Law 112–240).

section.text: It is the sense of Congress that the House of Representatives and the Senate should reconvene on or before December 18, 2013, to take appropriate action to enact this legislation.
